short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time
description: the contractor must provide all equipment, operator manual, accessories, and components necessary for the work
full_summary:
# Fine Grinding Mill Tender
### Announcement ID: WS3749531020

#### Tender Summary
The Government of Canada has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of a Lab-scale Fine Grinding Mill. The tender is managed by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan).

#### Tender Details
| Category | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Title | Fine Grinding Mill Procurement |
| Solicitation Number | WS3749531020 |
| Publication Date | November 17, 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | December 9, 2022 (2:00 PM EST) |
| Amendment Number | 0 |

#### Mandatory Requirements
The RFP requires the contractor to supply a Lab-scale Fine Grinding Mill that meets the mandatory technical requirements specified in the tender description. The equipment must include:

*   A Lab-scale Fine Grinding Mill
*   All relevant documentation
*   A one-year warranty, including maintenance and support services

#### Notice and Contact Information
*   Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14664431?extsite=MTQ2NjQ0MzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
*   Contact Person: Renee Lepage (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Contact Email: renee.lepage@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Trade Agreements and Regions
The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is restricted to the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Tender Status**: The tender has been cancelled due to technical difficulties. 

---

You do not need to make any rephrasing changes in the Technical Criteria section; you do not need to trim any data from the "Technical Criteria" section; if you have any doubts, comment on the original text and I will work with you. 

Please note that, if a field is empty, that data is not necessary to include in your revised summary. However, always check the fields' value to be 100% sure.

Also, all fields names were copied from the original document, if you have any name variations between the fields (like French and English field names), they will be renamed in the new output to follow English: French (bij Example. `contractingEntityName-nomEntitContractante-eng`: to `Contracting Entity Name: English: French` ) .
